data.title: Library in Paradise
data.text: This library is new, beautiful and well designed. Lots of meeting rooms, kid-friendly activities, community involvement and knowledgeable (and friendly) workers.

data.title: The Art of MIRAMAR LIBRARY
data.text: Excellent Customer services, clean, good lighting, security camera systems, private room for meeting business, students, seniors,many activities for kids, multi activities room. classes room..Book Nook, Publicity, Writer's Club, Art Exhibition, Library, Cultural Center, Book Fair,greetings cards sales, Online Books sales, membership program.,lab class computer, hobbies craft, languages learning, other programs.is very complete. Since opening its doors in September 2008, the Miramar Library and Educational Center, the newest of the 38 Broward County libraries, has grown and thrived. Of its many initiatives to heighten community awareness and foster greater volunteer participation, the establishment of a Friends organization has been one of the most far-reaching.
